Interests

Besides working on assigned and personal projects, I spend time looking into the latest in technology and other related industries. From trends in UI/UX to IT Law, I follow numerous topics of interest across a variety of reputable digital platforms.

Outside tech, I enjoy listening to music, cooking, gaming, watching sitcoms and writing short stories and humour articles - though this has been on and off. I generally prefer being indoors, but I'm always open to stepping out for leisure activities.
